event.title: Go Workshop
event.description:
Hello Bristol Gophers 👋!

We're doing something new! A Go workshop! This is aimed at developers looking at moving into the Go space. If that suits you, come join us.

The task:
To create a simple hangman game using only the core library.

The format:
We will guide you through breaking the problem down, and building the solution step by step.

Bonus points for having a tested, dockerised, server by the end of the event.

Rough timeframe:
- 18:30 Arrive and socialise
- 18:45 Short welcome presentation
- 19:00 Code!

🍺 As always, afterwards we will be heading to a pub for a little .

📣 We are looking for help with organising! If you or anyone you know would like to help, give us a shout! As you can see, our pun game especially is in dire need of a

📣Help us grow! JetBrains offers free licences to meet-ups with attendance greater than 30. If we can reach this, we will apply and be handing it out as a prize at events.

📍 - Brightpearl
🍕 - TBD
